keyword: how many calories are in spicy tuna roll
title: How Many Calories Are in a Spicy Tuna Roll?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in spicy tuna roll, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your sushi meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Spicy Tuna Roll?
assumptions: Standard 8-piece roll with raw tuna, spicy mayo (mayo + sriracha), sushi rice, nori seaweed; no extras like avocado or sesame.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, rice type, and mayo amount. Check sushi menu details or apps for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A standard spicy tuna roll contains about 320 calories, with good protein from tuna and carbs from rice.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use less spicy mayo (reduce by half)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 320 calories for a standard 8-piece roll.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: About 14 g protein, mainly from the tuna.

faqs.q: Are spicy tuna rolls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 650 mg due to soy sauce in rice and seasonings.

faqs.q: How do calories compare to other sushi rolls?
faqs.a: Similar to California roll (~300 kcal); higher than cucumber roll (~150 kcal) due to mayo and tuna.
No, with 38 g carbs from rice; opt for sashimi-style without rice for low-carb.
